title: Loading screen crashes
body:
I cant get into loading screen.

The customs AGAINST BOTS WORK. But in regular games? It automatically crashes.

I repaired the client, ive completely uninstalled and reinstalled, and allowed both the league client and leagueoflegends.exe through the fire wall.

Still nothing.

@riot help?

replies.body:
It sounds like you're having a hard time connecting to our gameservers, likely caused by an *unstable connection*. Our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) will walk you through the most common causes for an unstable connection and how to fix it.

If those steps didn't cause a change and you still encounter issues, let me know.
